section.p: The Payers section contains data on the patient's payers, whether a 'third party' insurance, self-pay, other payer or guarantor, or some combination.

ol.li: Conforms to CCD Payers Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.9)

SHOULD contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains Coverage Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.17)
Conforms to CCD Payers Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.9)
[CCD] CONF-31, CONF-32: SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "48768-6" Payment sources (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC 2.26)

[CCD] CONF-30: SHOULD contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Coverage Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.20)

contains Coverage Entry (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.17)
[CCD] CONF-34: SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'insurance' or 'payers'.
